room.title: Executive Room
room.description: Spacious and dedicated to contemporary design and comfort. The 15 story Casino Tower rooms are located directly above the casino. The 364 sq.ft. Casino Tower rooms are appointed with custom furnishings and an urban feel allowing for work and entertainment. Our Casino Tower Rooms offer a luxurious retreat.
